content: Korean mental hospitals have been compared to concentration camps. Patients are said to be treated like animals who are subjected to violence and maltreatment rather than therapy.
translations: ita:Gli ospedali psichiatrici coreani sono stati paragonati ai campi di concentramento. I pazienti si dice che siano stati t
